Detailed Description

RadioGroupControllerParams are used by widgets to tell their RadioGroupController how they want to be laid out.

The following example demonstrates how to use the RadioGroupControllerParams

 // create a Radio Group
 gaia::ui::RadioGroup* mpRadioGroup = new gaia::ui::RadioGroup(static_cast<Page*>(this));

 //create a Radio Button
 gaia::ui::RadioButton* mpRadioButton = new gaia::ui::RadioButton(static_cast<Page*>(this));

 // set RadioButton text
 mpRadioButton->setText("Hello");

 // create a RadioGroupControllerParams
 gaia::ui::RadioGroupControllerParams* mpRadioGroupControllerParams = new gaia::ui::RadioGroupControllerParams(
         ControllerParams::WRAP_CONTENT, ControllerParams::WRAP_CONTENT);

 // add RadioButton to RadioGroup
 mpRadioGroup->addWidget(mpRadioButton, 0, mpRadioGroupControllerParams);
See also:
RadioGroup
RadioButton
